metadata.dc:author: Alvarez Navascues, C
González González, M
Suárez González, A
González Sotorrio, N
Rodrigo Sáez, L
Rodríguez García, M
metadata.dc:description: We present an infrequent case of acute hepatitis by indomethacin, in a patient with a primary biliary cirrhosis, previously not diagnosed and asymptomatic, in who during in the follow-up, with a persistent analytical pattern of disociated cholestasis, a liver biopsy was indicated, with the final diagnosis of chronic non-suppurative destructive cholangitis.
metadata.dc:title: Hepatitis aguda por indometacina en una enferma con cirrosis biliar primaria asintomática.
[Acute ++indomethacin-induced hepatitis in a female patient with asymptomatic primary biliary cirrhosis].
